sentences.en: At the end of the queue waits an interminable lift journey.
sentences.cn: 排队等候结束后是漫长的电梯之旅.

sentences.en: I had interminable problems with my last car; it never worked well.
sentences.cn: 我上次的那辆车子没完没了地出故障, 它从未好好地行驶过.

sentences.en: I had interminable problems with my last computer; it never worked well.
sentences.cn: 我过去的那台计算机没完没了地出故障, 它从未好好地运行过.

sentences.en: I tried for a while to list the quotations on an interminable amount of stock.
sentences.cn: 我勉强列了一会那些不计其数的股票行情.

sentences.en: I was glad of company for the last, long hours of this interminable flight.
sentences.cn: 在这次漫无尽头的飞行的最后几个小时里,我有人作伴很高兴.

sentences.en: Its route seemed interminable, through the low, brick, suburban, populous va stness.
sentences.cn: 路程好象是漫无尽头似的, 沿途经过了不少住得拥挤不堪的郊区砖砌矮房子.

sentences.en: More than anything the rams helped to break what should have been on interminable marriage.
sentences.cn: 那些牡羊比任何东西都更严重地加速了他们那本该天长地久的婚姻的破裂.

sentences.en: She thought of the long walk back to the house and It'seemed interminable.
sentences.cn: 她想起还得走那么长一段路才能到家,简直是走不完的路啊!

sentences.en: The bus stopped and started , picked people up, let them down, and pursued its interminable course again unhurriedly.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车停停走走, 让人们上车下车, 然后不紧不慢地继续它那无休止的行程.

sentences.en: The distance seemed interminable, and the walk was most laborious.
sentences.cn: 距离好象无穷无尽似的, 走起来真够吃力.

sentences.en: Their quarrels about the trivia are always interminable.
sentences.cn: 他们对琐事的争吵总是没完没了.

sentences.en: Their quarrels about the trivia are not sll the time interminable.
sentences.cn: 她们对琐事的争吵总是没完没了.

sentences.en: They continue their cat - and - mouse game for a seemingly interminable period of time.
sentences.cn: 他们似乎没完没了地玩著这个猫 捉 老鼠的游戏.

sentences.en: Why would such a wonderful thing be interpreted as interminable?
sentences.cn: 这么美妙的事怎会被解读为[没完没了]?

sentences.en: Yours 4 th negotiation outlook interminable before our president return here end march.
sentences.cn: 你方4日电收悉.在我公司董事长三月底回来之前,估计交涉不会有结果.

trans.tran_cn: 冗长的，无止境的，没完没了
